title: Panier des Sens Eau de Toilette - Made in France (Jasmine)
features: The sunny and voluptuous scent of immaculate Jasmine. On the skin, the harmony of a bouquet of sensual white flowers offers fresh, sparkling and luminous notes around a vibrant and hypnotic jasmine.

MANUFACTURING: In the heart of flower country, overlooking theFrench Riviera, Grasse is recognized as the world capital of perfumery. It is known for the quality of its essences and creations. Panier des Sens celebrates the Grasse perfumery and its traditional skills, with this collection based on perfume absolutes.

SCENT: A floral fragrance with Jasmine Grandiflorum absolute: illuminated by the brightness of fruity, slightly honeyed notes.Jasmine Grandiflorum absolute unveils a draught of white flowers with voluptuous and generous notes.The heart of Jasmine, both poetic and sensual, is carried by a background of delicately muskedlight wood.
NOTE: Top notes : Orange blossom, white Peach, Neroli Heart notes : Jasmine, Tuberose Base notes : Cedarwood, Wormwood, white Musk

ENGAGEMENT: A land of flowers overlooking the CÃ´te d'Azur, Grasse is recognized as the world capital of perfumery for the quality of its essences and creations. Panier des Sens celebrates the Grasse perfumery and its traditional skills, with its collection based on Absolute perfumes. Genuine high-end perfumery gem, an Absolute is the most precious oil of the vegetal raw material. Absolutes are highly concentrated fragrant natural vegetal extracts, which make it a real aromatic treasure.
